Headline: Opinion: Israel will remain Netanyahu's even if he is no longer prime minister - CNN
Text: Opinion by Ahshel PfefferUpdated 2234 GMT (0634 HKT) May 31, 2021 Anshel Pfeffer(@anshelpfeffer) is a writer for Ha'aretz and the Israel correspondent of The Economist. He is the author of "Bibi: The Turbulent Life and Times of Benjamin Netanyahu." The views expressed here are his own. Read more opinion at CNN.  (CNN)On Sunday night, Naftali Bennett, the right-wing politician who may become Israel's new prime minister in a week, finally broke cover and lambasted his old boss and mentor Benjamin Netanyahu for trying to lead the state of Israel to his own "personal Masada" -- a reference to the Jewish zealots who committed mass suicide rather than become Roman slaves in the first century A.D.Sign up for CNN Opinion's new newsletter.Join us on Twitter and Facebook
